meanings.definition: The state of being gone or absent.
meanings.sent1: Her sudden goneness left us feeling lonely.
meanings.sent2: The goneness of the missing toy made the child sad.
meanings.sent3: The goneness of the cookies was a mystery until they were found in his room.
meanings.sent4: The goneness of the sun behind the clouds made the day feel gloomy.
meanings.sent5: The goneness of the last piece of cake was a disappointment for the party guests.

meanings.definition: The quality of being no longer present or in existence.
meanings.sent1: The sudden goneness of the old building surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The goneness of the ancient artifact puzzled the historians.
meanings.sent3: The goneness of the internet connection made him realize how much he relied on it.
meanings.sent4: The goneness of the stars in the city sky was a reminder of light pollution.
meanings.sent5: The goneness of the old traditions was evident in the modern celebrations.
